text: Daniel Cota (born September 12, 1985 in Los Mochis, Sinaloa, Mexico) is a Mexican professional boxer in the Heavyweight division.http://boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=322276&cat;=boxer ==Professional career== On October 1, 2010 Cota beat the veteran Ricardo Arce at the Polideportivo Centenario in Los Mochis, Sinaloa, Mexico.http://boxrec.com/show_display.php?show_id=607668
